articles.description: Joining the reigning premiers is tough enough, but Reimis Smith wants the added challenge of replacing one of the game's great finishers at the Melbourne Storm.
articles.content:
Joining the reigning premiers is tough enough, but Reimis Smith wants the added challenge of replacing one of the game's great finishers at the Melbourne Storm.

articles.author: Andrew Wu
articles.title: The father-son pact that has come back to haunt Pucovski's dad - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: Will Pucovski's father, Jan, is no fan of tattoos, but he's off to get some ink after an agreement he made with his then 10-year-old son.
articles.content:
Pucovski then asked his father would he get one if he was to play in the Test side.

articles.author: Adam Schefter
articles.title: Houston Texans QB Deshaun Watson bothered by team's hiring process, sources say - ESPN Australia
articles.description: After Deshaun Watson offered his input on potential GM candidates, the Texans neither considered nor consulted with those endorsed by the franchise QB prior to the team hiring Nick Caserio, which left him "infinitely more bothered."
articles.content: By hiring former New England Patriots executive Nick Caserio to solve a large set of problems within the organization, the Houston Texans have created additional ones with star quarterback Deshaun Wa… [+2722 chars]
